newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil rock star Chico Science dies in car crash.
newsitem.headline: Brazil rock star Chico Science dies in car crash.

text.p: One of Brazil's most popular rock stars, Chico Science, died in a car crash on his way to pre-Carnaval celebrations in his hometown in northeastern Brazil, authorities said on Monday.

The 30-year-old singer and songwriter died of severe head and thorax injuries in the accident on Sunday night outside Olinda, near Recife, the capital of Pernambuco state, a fire department spokesman said.
"He was dead when he arrived at the hospital," the spokesman said.

The death of Chico Science, whose real name is Francisco de Assis Franca, prompted Pernambuco state Gov. Miguel Arraes to declare three days of official mourning, local Agencia Estado news agency said.
The fire spokesman said the rock star's car was apparently struck by another vehicle, which did not stop. The cause of the collision was under investigation.
Chico Science led a movement in Brazilian music that mixes regional rhythms with Western-style rock.
